data.title: Mota-Engil Nigeria
data.meta_description:
Mota-Engil Nigeria | 3,264 followers on LinkedIn. We move worlds | Mota-Engil Nigeria incorporates, the Mota-Engil Group, a multinational, operating in the 3 continents, with operations in the segments of Engineering and Construction, Environment and Services, Transport Concession, Energy and Mining.
Mota-Engil Nigeria adopts a unique and integrated strategic approach for the future: a more innovative and competitive company.
data.text: Today is #AfricaDay! Let's honour the rich and diverse cultural legacy of this incredible continent by delving into its #LivingHeritage. Africa Day is a moment to recognize the past, embrace the present, and look forward to the future with hope and resilience. Let's come together to appreciate and preserve the #IntangibleHeritage that makes Africa so unique. Share your favourite #IntangibleHeritage element from Africa in the comments below!ðŸ‘‡ Learn more: https://lnkd.in/eav-WwnQ
